description: Manifest for generating parallel universes of development for FinalRound AI.

universes.name: Universe-F (Frontend)
universes.description: Handles all user-facing interfaces and interactions.
universes.primaryGoal: Create a responsive, intuitive, and unified user experience across web and mobile platforms.

universes.name: Universe-B (Backend)
universes.description: Microservices-based backend to handle all business logic and API requests.
universes.primaryGoal: Develop scalable, secure, and independent microservices for each core functionality.
outputArtifacts: FastAPI service code for Auth, User, Resume, Interview, and Feedback.

universes.name: Universe-D (Data)
universes.description: Manages all data persistence, including relational, vector, and object storage.
universes.primaryGoal: Ensure data integrity, scalability, and fast retrieval.

universes.name: Universe-A (AI/ML)
universes.description: Integration with external AI models for core intelligent features.
universes.primaryGoal: Provide high-quality, real-time AI-driven insights for users.

universes.name: Universe-I (Infrastructure)
universes.description: Handles the deployment, scaling, and monitoring of the entire system.
universes.primaryGoal: Automate deployment and ensure high availability and reliability of the platform.
